entries.name: MAX_MULTIPART_COUNT
entries.desc: Maximum number of request parameters when multipart

entries.name: NEEDS_BINMODE
entries.desc: Whether processing will be required in binary vs text

entries.name: accept_charset
entries.desc: Return the accept character set for this CGI instance.

entries.name: accept_charset()
entries.desc: Return the accept character set for all new CGI instances.

entries.name: accept_charset=(accept_charset)
entries.desc: Set the accept character set for all new CGI instances.

entries.name: parse(query)
entries.desc: Parse an HTTP query string into a hash of key=>value pairs.

entries.name: header(options='text/html')
entries.desc: This method is an alias for http_header, when HTML5 tag maker is inactive.

entries.name: print(*options)
entries.desc: Print an argument or list of arguments to the default output stream
